markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dread Striker](/Feats.aspx?ID=561) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 184 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91) (Level 6)

</column>

---

You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses. Any creature that has the frightened condition is also flat-footed against your attacks.
name: Dread Striker
